name: BINGBRUSH 3 Pcs Color Changing Change Lipstick Lip Balm,Korean Magic Lipstick Color Change Changing Lip Tint Tinted Stain Gloss Balm Long Lasting Waterproof Moisturizer Lipstick Set for Women
review: It's moisturizing, altho it dries out sooner than I wish it would. But the color lingers pretty well, so I just add clear gloss or lip balm to my lips when they've become too dry & there's still enough color left. The darker pink is a bit too intense, kinda too Barbie Doll pink, so I apply it very lightly &/or just add a very light coat of the orange to change up the intenseness of it. The light pink is almost too un-intense, if that makes sense. (A happy medium between the 2 pinks would've appealed more to me). The orange is pretty intense also, so I apply that very lightly or add some of the light pink to it to make it not SO orange. But everyone is different, so you just have to play around/experiment with the colors, which is kinda fun. So while not perfect, I'm giving the trio 4 stars instead of 5. I enjoy the challenge.When all's said & done, I'd say, "go ahead & give it a try". It is returnable, so you don't have much to lose.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 3 September 2022

review: I should've looked at it more closely... but I trusted the title when I read, "KOREAN MAGIC LIP BLAM....".  I bought the 3-pc color changing Korean magic lip balm set & all I saw was CHINESE writings + MADE in CHINA.I'm Korean and if I looked at the 3rd pic, I would've never bought it.  Korean products just meet higher standards in just about all criteria since most of us are perfectionist... lol.I couldn't tell you much about the product since I didn't open one I realized it's a Korean-Item-Wannabe, I'm just returning it straight back.There's not even the same claim of "Korean Magic..." written on the actual products either.  Scam...
